short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows access to webpages through the Adelaide University Library proxy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you study at Adelaide University? Ever been annoyed about researching and finding an article that you really want but you have to pay for it?

FEAR NOT! For the days of annoyance and headbanging are over!

MatCon studios presents "Substitution Jutsu" for Google Chrome

1. Install extension
2. Navigate to the research paper that requires registration or subscription
3. Click the [Substitution Jutsu] button located on the extensions toolbar
4. Enter your username and password (only required once per browser session)
5. Enjoy!

Disclaimer: This extension is specifically tailored for student and staff of the University of Adelaide. All efforts have been made to ensure that this extension is bug free and will provide access to most online journals and databases. However, in the event that a webpage cannot be put through the university proxy, it is very likely that the university has not subscribed to that particular journal/database. Therefore, to gain access, please consult your faculty's staff so that they may subscribe to the journal/database. The creators of this extension takes no responsibilities in any privacy, ethical, academic, moral or ethnic issues that may arise from the usage of this extension.
